title: Advanced Search Functionality with Filters and Sorting
description: Implement comprehensive search capabilities with multi-field filtering, sorting options, and real-time results to help users quickly locate specific user stories, acceptance tests, and reference documents.
iWant: advanced search functionality with filtering and sorting capabilities
soThat: I can efficiently locate specific stories and documents across large project datasets
acceptanceCriteria: Search supports text queries across story titles, descriptions, and acceptance criteria
Filter options include status, assignee, components, and story points range
Results display with sorting by relevance, date created, or story points
Search executes within 500ms and highlights matching terms in results
